articles.title: Google Maps Street View: Man spotted with suspicious trouser stain in embarrassing photo - Express
articles.description: GOOGLE Maps Street View photos often go viral when they depict bizarre, entertaining or shocking scenes. One embarrassing shot made the rounds when a spot was spotted in a rather awkward situation.
articles.content: Google Maps Street View is home to all sorts of spectacles snapped all over the world. It may have originally been created for serious reasons but it's become known for its trove of oddities. One suc… [+1007 chars]
